game.name: TailofScorpios
game.genres: Adventure, Casual, RPG, Free To Play
game.shortDescription: "Scorpion's Tail" is a AVG set in an alternate historical timeline. In the war-born nation of SouthXi, a conspiracy involving girls begins to surface.Investigator Zhang Cheng meets a mysterious girl. After accepting request, he is drawn into a web of secrets.
